name: Solar Spark
description:
Venture into a marvellous world that combines Egyptian myth with science fiction. Slay your enemies and explore the verdant beauty of the Sacred Oasis to overthrow the tyrannical Desert King Set.

Play as Eset - an exiled queen on a quest to resurrect her deceased consort Osiris while struggling against the endless hordes of Set's cybernetic monstrosities.

Eset's journey will take her across the domain of the Nile Lord Sobek - a place where superstitions coexist with technology and myths collide with mysteries of the ancient past, lying dormant for you to uncover.
